query:
SELECT 
  sr.id as romaneioId,
  sr.romaneioNumber,
  sr.status as romaneioStatus,
  sr.createdAt,
  COUNT(DISTINCT sri.invoiceId) as totalInvoices,
  GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT i.invoiceNumber ORDER BY i.invoiceNumber SEPARATOR ', ') as invoiceNumbers
FROM shippingRomaneios sr
LEFT JOIN shippingRomaneioInvoices sri ON sr.id = sri.romaneioId
LEFT JOIN invoices i ON sri.invoiceId = i.id
WHERE sr.status IN ('pending', 'in_progress', 'loaded')
GROUP BY sr.id, sr.romaneioNumber, sr.status, sr.createdAt
ORDER BY sr.createdAt DESC;
